caption.title: Overall cumulative exposure–response.
caption.p: Exposure–response association across all lags (0 to 5 months) for (a) the SPI-6 relative to the baseline SPI-6 = 0 and (b) Tmin relative to the baseline Tmin = 20°C. SPI-6, 6-month standardised precipitation index; Tmin, minimum temperature.
Click here for additional data file.
